TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ListItemType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of an item in a list control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType> enumeration represents the different items that can be included in a list control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> controls. A typical list control consists of cells that contain elements represented by this enumeration.
## Examples <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType AlternatingItem = int32(3)

Docs.summary: An item in alternating (zero-based even-indexed) cells. It is data-bound.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType EditItem = int32(5)

Docs.summary: An item in a list control currently in edit mode. It is data-bound.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType Footer = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A footer for the list control. It is not data-bound.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType Header = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A header for the list control. It is not data-bound.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType Item = int32(2)

Docs.summary: An item in the list control. It is data-bound.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType Pager = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A pager that displays the controls to navigate to different pages associated with the control. It is not data-bound.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType SelectedItem = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A selected item in the list control. It is data-bound.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType Separator = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A separator between items in a list control. It is not data-bound.
